channel.title: Shutting down forums
channel.description:
There hasn't been any activity to speak of here in a few years now, I'm considering archiving the forums as static HTML and shutting down discourse.
It's been a great run and we still have a very active community on IRC at [irc.moparisthebest.com](ircs://irc.moparisthebest.com:6697/mopar) TLS port 6697 #mopar, please join! ([webchat](https://www.moparisthebest.com/kiwi/))
If you want to say anything or leave any contact details feel free, I'll also put the link here to the GitHub repo the static site will live in so if you come by after it's converted you can still comment via pull request.
Thanks for everything and remember, hold on to your butts!

item.title: Shutting down forums
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There hasn’t been any activity to speak of here in a few years now, I’m considering archiving the forums as static HTML and shutting down discourse.
